channel.title: Nagarahole on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Nagarahole on TechnoStreet

item.title: Safari in Nagarahole buffer zone dropped
item.description: Safari in Nagarahole buffer zone dropped Scientific study to be done to retain animals inside forests and to minimise human-animal conflict Kushalnagar: Under pressure from the farmers, environment activists and the people of Kodagu, the Forest Department has dropped the proposed safari inside the buffer zone of Nagarahole Tiger Reserve that was likely to commence during winter.
